Code preview of the reference City_For_FlagCity

USE DATABASECOUNTRYHL
go

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1
FROM SYS.SYSREFERENCES R JOIN SYS.SYSOBJECTS O ON (O.ID = R.CONSTID AND O.TYPE = 'F')
WHERE R.FKEYID = OBJECT_ID('CITY_FLAG') AND O.NAME = 'FK_CITY_FLA_CITY_FOR__CITY')
ALTER TABLE CITY_FLAG
DROP CONSTRAINT FK_CITY_FLA_CITY_FOR__CITY
go

ALTER TABLE CITY_FLAG
ADD CONSTRAINT FK_CITY_FLA_CITY_FOR__CITY FOREIGN KEY (CIT_ID)
REFERENCES CITY (CIT_ID)
go
